command: sudo iptables -A INPUT -p udp --dport 9 -m string --algo bm --hex-string "|FFFFFFFFFFFF|" -m recent --name T1205_WOL --set -j LOG --log-prefix "T1205_WOL_SIG "
explanation: Detects Wake-on-LAN style magic packets (leading 6x 0xFF bytes) to use as a covert activation signal, consistent with T1205 traffic signaling patterns.
rationale_steps: Match application-specific WOL magic packet signature on UDP/9 to identify covert triggers.
Record source via recent list and log for anomaly detection without permitting access.
